name: description
Steel: In allomancy, steel is conisdered an external, physical, pulling metal. Burning steel allows the user to see blue lines that point towards nearby sources of metal. Size and brightness scale proportionally to how close the user is to the metal. Additonally, the user can attempt to push the metal source towards them: however, if the user is lighter, the user is pushed away from the source instead. The pairing for steel is iron.
